A very worthy sequel of the first part.The gameplay and animations are impressively fluid.The details of the characters\, their facial expressions\, their behavior are astonishing. Together with the scope and insane amount of details of the environments\, the compositional layout of the levels and the bombastic sound and music\, they tell most of the story.The Last of Us Part II has an incomparable narrative depth and it continues the story of the first part very well - but also with an unexpected hardness. The characters are incredibly complex\, authentic and interesting. Their actions and decisions\, however\, are also deeply stirring but still relatable.Naughty Dog uses the game as a medium to create an unprecedentedly reflective way of portraying the actions and decisions of the characters.   An experience which it only achieves because it forces the player to experience the story from different perspectives and to back the decisions and emotions of the two main characters\, which makes the game extremely emotionally challenging for me.The representation of violence is without question extremely disturbing and uncomfortably realistic.
